name: afk
description: AFK - Away From Keyboard - Remote terminal access service

scripts.build: npm run docker:build && npm run server:build && npm run web:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run lint

author: joshstuartx+afk@gmail.com
